QueryDefinition.Query:
WITH clinDates AS ( select distinct p.ptid, cast(replace(p.ptid, 'PT','') as bigint) as PersonId, lower(gender) gender, case when lower(birth_yr) like '% and earlier' then '1927' else birth_yr end as YearOfBirth, race, case when lower(race) = 'caucasian' then 8527 when lower(race) = 'african american' then 8516 when lower(race) = 'asian' then 8515 else 0 end as RaceConceptId, ethnicity, case when lower(ethnicity) = 'hispanic' then 38003563 else 0 end as EthnicityConceptId, region + '_' + division as location_source_value, provid_pcp, CAST(SUBSTRING(first_month_active, 5, 2) + '/01/' + SUBSTRING(first_month_active, 1, 4) AS DATE) clin_start_date, first_month_active, DATEADD(DAY, -1, DATEADD(MONTH, 1, CAST(SUBSTRING(last_month_active, 5, 2) + '/01/' + SUBSTRING(last_month_active, 1, 4) as DATE))) clin_end_date, last_month_active, substring(date_of_death, 1, 4) + '-' + substring(date_of_death, 5, 2) + '-01' as date_of_death, case when date_of_death is not null then 1 else 0 end as died, '' as cause_source_value FROM {sc}.patient as p JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND p.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE where birth_yr != 'Unknown' ), eligDates AS ( SELECT distinct ptid, CASE WHEN eligeff < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE eligeff END elig_start_date, CASE WHEN eligend < '05/01/2000' THEN '05/01/2000' ELSE eligend END elig_end_date, COALESCE(bus,'') + ' ' bus, CASE WHEN ASO = 'Y' THEN '(ASO) ' else '' END as aso, CASE WHEN PRODUCT = 'HMO' THEN 'Health Maint Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'PPO' THEN 'Preferred Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'EPO' THEN 'Exclusive Provider Org ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'IND' THEN 'Indemnity ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'POS' THEN 'Point of Service ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'ALL' THEN 'National Ancillaries, All Products ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'UNK' THEN 'Unknown ' WHEN PRODUCT = 'OTH' THEN 'Other ' ELSE COALESCE(PRODUCT,'') END AS product, CASE WHEN CDHP = 1 THEN '(HRA)' WHEN CDHP = 2 THEN '(HSA)' ELSE '' END as cdhp, PAT_PLANID FROM {sc}.member_detail as md JOIN {sc}._chunks ch ON ch.ChunkId = {0} AND md.ptid = ch.PERSON_SOURCE_VALUE )
select md.ptid,elig_start_date,elig_end_date,bus,aso,product,cdhp,pat_planid,personid,gender,yearofbirth,race,raceconceptid,ethnicity,ethnicityconceptid,location_source_value,provid_pcp,clin_start_date,first_month_active,clin_end_date,last_month_active,date_of_death,died,cause_source_value, LTRIM(bus) + LTRIM(aso) + LTRIM(product) + LTRIM(cdhp) as PayerSource, 38000280 as PeriodTypeConceptId, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(d, clin_start_date, elig_start_date) < 0 THEN clin_start_date ELSE elig_start_date END observation_period_start_date, CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(d, clin_end_date, elig_end_date) > 0 THEN clin_end_date ELSE elig_end_date END observation_period_end_date from eligDates as md LEFT JOIN clinDates p ON md.ptid = p.ptid where elig_start_date < clin_end_date AND clin_start_date < elig_end_date order by PersonId
